plot: Five husbands, five ex-wives, five anonymous stories during poker night. They are seducing construction workers, being raped by a hygienist and a dentist, seducing guys in a porno theater, being a dominatrix and a would-be porn star.
title: Afternoon Delights
plot_es: Five husbands, five ex-wives, five anonymous stories during poker night. They are seducing construction workers, being raped by a hygienist and a dentist, seducing guys in a porno theater, being a dominatrix and a would-be porn star.
